headline: Enphase Energy Lawsuits Put Inventory Disclosures And Valuation In Spotlight
summary: Several law firms have launched securities fraud class action lawsuits against Enphase Energy, alleging misrepresentations about channel inventory management. The suits claim the company and certain executives understated the impact of a major energy tax credit termination on the business. These legal actions focus on whether Enphase Energy's public statements adequately reflected operational and policy related risks. Enphase Energy (NasdaqGM:ENPH) is back in focus as these lawsuits arrive...

headline: Analysts See IQ9 Microinverters Driving Enphase Energy’s (ENPH) Future Growth
summary: Enphase Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENPH) ranks among the best sustainability stocks to invest in. On February 6, Freedom Capital Markets boosted Enphase Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:ENPH)’s price target from $31 to $44, while keeping a Hold rating on the company’s shares. The hike follows Enphase Energy’s positive revision of its Q1 2026 revenue projection, with the company […]
